teaser: President Obama will unveil his plan for immigration reform today, after a bipartisan group of senators released theirs yesterday. It's expected that both plans will provide a pathway to citizenship for millions of immigrants who are in the U.S. illegally. What would immigration reform mean for your paycheck? Research in Motion is set to release its new Blackberry 10 tomorrow -- and the stakes could not be higher for the company. The Blackberry once dominated the U.S. smart phone market, but now only 10 percent of smart phone users carry one. And, a look at a new PBS documentry on Henry Ford, one of the most successful businessmen in all of history.
byline: Queena Kim, Bob Moon, Jeff Tyler, Jeremy Hobson, Stephan Richter, Dan Bobkoff, Mark Garrison and Sam Beard
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, January 29, 2013
